GET /api.description: Serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

queries: Accepts all properties of a project as a query, e.g. '/api/projects?client=Arup'.
Multiple project queries can be included.
Queries are matched with AND (&) not OR.

GET /api/project/:project_number.description: get a project by its number

POST /api/project.description: post a project with its number

PATCH /api/project/:project_number.description: patch a project by its number

DELETE /api/project/:project_number.description: delete a project by its number

GET /api/project/:project_number/records.description: get all the records from a project

records.remarks: among other problems, and others, this is a POST test, and has been rectified.

POST /api/project/:project_number/record.description: post a record with its number

GET /api/project/:project_number/record/.description: get one record from a project with version

PATCH /api/project/:project_number/recor.description: patch a record by its version and project number

DELETE /api/project/:project_number/reco.description: delete a record by its number
